data.text: @Manasseh_Azure Manasseh u are not a public health person and dnt be thinking u r the epitome of knowledge...sometimes listen to experts n stop this cheap propaganda
@benamoah01 @Manasseh_Azure I idea was saved, never shot down, it can be laid again. There's hope. Ghanaians never voted, the idea was saved.

@Manasseh_Azure U played a role in all these. Have u forgotten about the lies u perpetrated against Mahama which brought all of us on our knees, the guinea fowl scandal....my friend shut up. 
Why has Akuffo Addo stopped chasing u kuraaa
@Manasseh_Azure That's Ghana for you,waste of resources.

@Manasseh_Azure The reality has now dawn on them. Maybe they thought they were losing the 2020 elections so by making such reckless borrowings and spendings  they were going to make it difficult for the next government.
@akwakwa15 @Manasseh_Azure Did you read ? Says even when the schools were closed for 3 months. Now tell me who needs a closed school fumigated?

@michael_makafui @Manasseh_Azure Indeed if the MMDCEs were elected by their people rather than appointed by the sitting president, and allowed to develop and run their own budgets as you rightly say, there will be a lot more accountability. But this idea was shot down in the referendum. Sadly!
@Manasseh_Azure When power is handed over to shallow-minded people claiming to be preaching the gospel of virtues, but are busy practising vice..
@Manasseh_Azure And they want us to make sacrifices 🙄🤧
